definitions: an automatic mechanism for activating a device at a preset time
shortDefinitions: automatic mechanism for activating device at preset time

definitions: a person or device that measures or records the amount of time taken by a process or activity

examples.text: the challenge is to play the game with the timer

shortDefinitions: person or device that measures or records amount of time taken by process or activity

definitions: used to indicate how many times someone has done something

examples.text: for most first-timers the success rate is 45 percent

shortDefinitions: used to indicate how many times someone has done something
